name: Träumerei Chapter 2
description:
CHAPTER 2-For Whom the Bell Tolls 

Original Release Date: July 28, 2019  The year is 1524 A.D., and self proclaimed exorcist Noël Rousseau has been wandering across a country within a state of constant fall and autumn leaves. Wracked with guilt and plagued with vague memories of his previous life, idealistic and bizarrely inane Noël has made it his goal in life to search for the source of his problems–his grandmother, XXXX. 

Donning a witch doctor mask, the lone traveler comes across a peculiar town harboring its own dark secrets…and the mournful spirit of an executed witch who appears to have connections with his long-forgotten past…… 

"The road to hell is paved with good intentions."

This game requires you to install the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP to play! It is also not necessary to have played Chapter 0 before this as the demo is non-canon. However, I do recommend playing Chapter 1 first.
